scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:js: npx terser assets/js/main.js -o assets/js/main.min.js -c -m && npx terser assets/js/utils.js -o assets/js/utils.min.js -c -m
scripts.validate: npm run validate:schema && npm run validate:runs
scripts.generate: npm run generate:game-pages && npm run generate:run-categories && npm run generate:codeowners
scripts.check: npm run check:game-pages && npm run check:run-categories && npm run check:codeowners
scripts.sync:git: git fetch origin && git reset --hard origin/main
